allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add architecture decision document with project context and starter evaluation

Architecture workflow steps 1-3 complete: project context analysis \(18 FRs,
NFRs, cross-cutting concerns, failure modes\), platform decision \(Tauri v2
over Electron\), starter template selection \(dannysmith/tauri-template\),
and LLM provider decision \(Anthropic Claude single-vendor\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
